title: another houston issue thread
body: Having weird latency issues with League only in Houston. I've seen a few other posts about it too, throwing my hat in the ring.

replies.body: Feel free to drop me a trace route so we can get a bigger picture of what your connection is looking like as well! You can use [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to run that trace to 104.160.131.1 for about 10 min, and post those results here when you're ready!
